comments.content: 重量輕點多組效過比較好，胸肌要有感受度💪
是否可以先飛鳥 在握推?

first.content: 我各人覺得順序並不重要，像這三種胸部動作前，我會先做30*3的扶地挺身熱身，飛鳥後一個簡單的胸部用力收尾
first.name: 黃永忠

last.content: perhaps you should read a little more of the conversation , so as to speak intelligently

last.content: I'll even dumb it down for ya, and provide you with the summary. the original question was (essentially) some guy wanting to known if he's current training routine is sufficient to promote muscle hypertrophy, when I answered with the suggestion of reversing the order of his usual excercise order.(per the pre exhaust pronciple).he responded saying he doesn't think** the order of movement is important. to which I then gave up and just pointed to the door and gave him the old proverb "if you....
